entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add project id to rude edit telemetry #67113
  • Implement EnC support for Primary Constructors #67108
  • Implement EE support for Primary Constructors #67107
  • Unify the way MethodCompiler gets synthesized lowered method bodies #67104
  • Finalize naming strategy for Primary Constructor parameters backing fields #67103
  • Setting ProvideCommandLineArgs to the Csc/Vbc task includes non-Csc args #67102
  • UnitTests.Semantics.BinaryOperators test failure on Fedora rawhide #67101
  • Primary constructor parameter assignment in initializers uses wrong nullable warning #67099
  • C# compilation fails: Process terminated. System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException #67091
  • Property pattern block doesn't format well in else if #67090
  • Completions should not show `Obsolete` items with `error` set to `true` #67089
  • AnalyzerDriver should not capture cancellation token #67084

Closed

  • ExplicitType and target-typed new #42554
    Backlog
  • Keyword color for u8 identifier is broken in VS 17.5 Preview 3 #66507
  • Type inference should be able to infer U? for T when T? (and inference differs when a discard is used) #50782
    Backlog
  • Intellisense: Suggested type after new does not include array type #42441
    Backlog
  • Add VB option to control whether completion auto-shows in completion lists #42369
    Backlog
  • IDE0260 recommends switching to invalid pattern #67010
  • Executing `prop` snippet after accessibility modifier throws exception #67053
  • Expand scope for Add Null Checks and Add Null Checks for All Parameters #41140
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33427.682 #67088
  • Visual Basic: "Object initialization can be simplified (IDE0017)" wrong indent with custom tab/indent size #66071
    Backlog
  • Convert to raw string doesn't offer to change semantics if there is only whitespace at the end of the string #61267
    17.6 P3
  • Searching for a type or method in solution explorer shows multiple references #41836
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use CallStackWindow icon for StackTrace Explorer menu button #67112
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #67111
    Area-Compilers
  • Delay ref safety analysis of placeholder replacements #67110
    Area-Compilers
  • Address remaining PROTOTYPE comments #67109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • link isexternalinit to avoid errors in O# about missing reference #67106
    Area-IDE
  • Update PDB behavior for 'using alias to type', and add EE and PDB tests. #67105
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
  • Avoid delegate allocations in IExtensionManagerExtensions #67100
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid large object heap allocations in classification #67098
    Area-IDE
  • Do not offer `string` afer `ref/readonly` inside namespace member declaration #67097
    Area-IDE
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67092
    Area-Compilers
  • Thread cancellationToken instead of capturing it in delegates #67087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Sort unimported items from System.* ahead of other unimported items #67083
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66936
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix utf8 classification #67096
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix issue in 'use pattern matching' #67047
    Next
  • Update LSIF generator to latest bin log reader #67085
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Fix crash of property snippets after accessibility modifier #67054
    Community, Next
  • Disable EnC for more Primary Constructors scenarios #67026
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Improve the spans that 'add parameter check' is supported in #67004
    Next
  • Bump up priority for formatting analyzer #67093
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Improve 'convert regular to raw-string' for common cases (like test code). #67060
    Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Improve the caching logic in OOP DiagnosticComputer #67068
    Tenet-Performance, Performance-Scenario-Responsiveness, Next
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract remote keep-alive code into its own component #67073
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude CSharp.EditorFeature from vs_perf_designtime_ide_searchtest #67076
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #67114
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix VisualStudioSettingsOptionPersister issues and increase test coverage #67064
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Removed "sealed" from base class #64983
    Area-IDE
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers
  • use Path.Combine to avoid using platform specific path seperators #67066
    Community
  • Update tests to use raw strings #67059
  • Fix crash of type snippets after accessibility modifier #67055
    Community
  • WIP: Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #67078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • Port Rename and Formatting tests to the new framework #67020
  • Don't show expanded items in certain scenarios #67049
